original_text: Then I saw a great white throne. I saw that God was sitting on it. The earth and the sky rushed away from the place where he sat. There was no longer any place for them.
korean_text: 또 내가 크고 흰 보좌와 그 위에 앉으신 이를 보니 땅과 하늘이 그 앞에서 피하여 간 데 없더라

sentences.original_text: Then I saw a great white throne.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 위대한 흰 보좌를 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: I saw that God was sitting on it.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그 보좌에 앉아 계신 것을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: The earth and the sky rushed away
from the place where he sat.
There was no longer any place for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 위한 더 이상의 장소가 없었습니다.
